data.content: :nerd_face: Please don't use slash commands in the *#product-support* channel. The reply will be visible to everyone :flushed:
Type '/ps_channel_guidelines' into the *PS Bot* app to see the channel guidelines for *#product-support*
Type '/ps_trouble_shooting' into the *PS Bot* app for web and app troubleshooting guides
Type '/ps_channel_guidelines' into the *PS Bot* app to see a list of the most useful links
